entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Delta
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
